-e ---

𒋫 𓈋 ⇔ 𓃾 𓄀 𓃒 𓃓 𓃽 𒋫 Taur/cattle 𒄞 gudeal cow® үгеҙ ügeð 𓃖 𓃕

𔑼 𔒁 𔒃 𔑺 𔑾 𔒀 𔑻 Vieh 𔑿 Muh 𓏠 𓈖 𓃒

Taurᵘˢ 𒋫 ☽ 𓄋 󲁢 󲁣 𐘄 TO 𐀵 toʳ

𒋼 ≈ 𓃾 𓄀 in 𒋼𒋼 η Tauri …

Taur ⇔ 𓂧 𓂋 𓄛 𓄜 𓄝 Tier 𒋾 TIʳ 𐠯 ti ≈ 󲀕 󲀖 󲀗 tîr 𓌕

𓏏 𓊪 𓇋 𓅱 𓃒 | ox | Tapir > ταῦρος > távros > Taur > 𒋗𒌑𒊒 šūru cowr < capri:cattle

𒋫 𒀫 ZUR < Taur 𓃒 𒆳𒀫𒊑 KUR.ṣur-ri Tyre ⇔ Stier

Taurᵘˢ ≈ Saurᵘˢ 𓂧 𓂋 𓄛 𓆈 “Beast” ⇔ bos 𓃾 Tier

𓇋 𓂧 𓂋 𓎪 𓃒 𓏥 | herd (of animals) | עֵדֶר 'éder Getier Tier herd®

☽ տարի tari 𒋫 taurᵒⁿ 𓄋 ⲧⲁⲡ > corn > horn

Taur:
Proto-Indo-European *táwros “bull, ox”
Proto-Semitic *ṯawr >

Taur 𐎘𐎗 ṯr 𐩻𐩥𐩧 ṯwr תורא tawrā ثَوْر ṯawr ሶር sor שׁוֹר šor 𒋗𒌑𒊒 šūrum
𒄞𒌉 GU4.TUR Getier šu-lum تاول tāvel ثور ṯōr שׁוֹר šor ⇔ Stier

Kartvelian ხარი xari

Taurᵘˢ Pan-Eurasian wanderword and mega root (Stier Torrero Minotaur, ...)
𒋫 𓄀 𓃒 𓃓 𓃽 𓃾 ... 𓌻 Turk Oxus 8
Tier Tail 𓄢 𓄜 𓄛 < tear Track drag
𓈋 dual 𓏏𓏏 dvał duo dos 2 多 🌙 dale Tal valley
𓈋 ⇔ 𓃾 𓄀 𓃒 𓃓 𓃽 Taur/cattle 𒄞 gudeal үгеҙ ügeð
𓏏 Teil 𐌲𐌰𐌳𐌰𐌹𐌻𐌾𐌰𐌽 geteilt Çatalhöyük çatal "fork" cut

𓇼 tauraro stern ⇔ Stier taur 𓃾

Interestingly but unsurprisingly, Egyptian has the longest roots:

𓏏 𓊪 𓇋 𓅱 𓃒 | ox | Tapir > ταῦρος > távros > Taur > 𒋗𒌑𒊒 šūru cowr ⇔ capre cattle
𓏏 𓊪 𓇋 𓅱 𓃒 | ox | Tapair > ta phallus > al phallus > alpu bull बैल bail віл
𓏏 𓊪 𓇋 𓅱 𓃒 | ox | Tapair > team-pair
𓏏 𓊪 𓇋 𓂉 𓃒 | ox | Tapaïn > boyinturuq boyunduruk
𓏏 𓊪 𓇋 𓅱 𓃒 | ox | Tapir > deppert "Hornochse" (foolish)
𓏏 𓊪 𓇋 𓅱 𓃒 | ox | Tapir > ταῦρο ⇔ •tsapu ≈ zebu 🐃 @ Indus ?
𓏏 𓊪 𓇋 𓅱 𓃒 | ox | Tapir > par
𓏏 𓊪 𓇋 𓅱 𓃒 | ox | Tapir > ⵜⴰⴼⵓⵏⴰⵙⵜ tafunast "cow"
𓏏 𓊪 𓇋 𓅱 𓃒 | ox | Taper :

𒋰 TAB 𓄋 ⲧⲁⲡ > corn > horn(tip) 𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 𓄏 𓏤 horn ቀርን qarn

𒋫𒁉𒄷 ta-bi-ḫu butcher

𒋭 ţābu 𒋫𒁍 ṭa-bu top “good, sweet”

Feminine form of Taur:
ⵜⴰⴼⵓⵏⴰⵙⵜ tafunast ⇔ Tapir
Hebrew: תורתא f (tōrtā, tōrto) Taur+ta
Syriac: ܬܘܪܬܐ f (tōrtā, tōrto)

Taur ⇔ Bauer > bull
bull פר par ⇔ 𒀫 BURU: bull-calf
bull बैल bail boi
bull бугъа buġa > оҕус ᵇoğus ᵇochse ox
bull бугъа buġa býk бик bik ביק bik בוהײַ buhay (Yiddish)
bull Bummal ᵇannimal ?? <?> 𐌁𐌖𐌌 bum banteng
bull bovulo ⇔ buffalo
bull βοῦς boûs bos böse
bull ⇔ cow គោបា koo baa

𓏏 𓊪 𓇋 𓅱 𓃒 | ox | Tapir > ταῦρος => 𒋫 Taur vs Bauer 𒁍 púʳ par פר bull

𒋫 ⲁ ⋍ 𐌳 dha ALTA al𐌸a ≠ alpha pha α 𒁍

公牛 (zh) (gōngniú)

⇔ σαῦρος saûros “lizard, reptile” •beast

𒁲𒋫𒉡 di-ta-nu
𒁲𒋫𒉡 bison

𒁕𒁕𒊒 da-da-ru •the Taurus
𒁕𒁕𒊒 (a foetid plant, phps.) centaury

𒌅𒊏𒄷 tu-ra-ḫu
𒌅𒊏𒄷 mountain goat, wild goat

𒊭𒄷𒀀𒉿 ša-ḫu a-pi
𒊭𒄷𒀀𒉿 wild boar

𒀭𒋫 AN-TA ἀνώτερος anṓteros "upper" ⇔ Taurᵒˢ ( 𒀭 AN ἀνώ )

𐘄 TO 𐀵 toʳ > •thro στό

𐘄 TO 𐀵 to Taur according to Miguel Valério https://www.academia.edu/69149241 ⇔ 𒋼 TE
𐘄 TO 𐀵 to top ⇔ 𓄋 𓏏 𓊪 ⲧⲁⲡ 𒋰 TAB "horn" 𓂧 𓃀 𓄏 ⲧⲁⲡ

𓏠 𓈖 𓃒 𓀸 ⲙⲁⲛⲉⲥⲱⲟⲩ manager manadero "herder" man@taur ⲥⲱⲟⲩⲃⲉⲛ grass/know
𓏠 𓈖 𓃒 𓀸 ⲙⲁⲛⲉⲥⲱⲟⲩ man@ⲉⲥⲱⲟⲩ "sheep" => shepherd

𜧖 𜧗 𜧘 𜧙 𜧚 𜧛 𜧜 𜧝 𜧞 𜧞 tail @ taur
𜦾 𜧟 ≈ opposing 𜧢 𓃾 𓃒 in bull fight image but 𜛺 ≈ 𜛾 ≈ 𜦮 ≠ 𜗹 8 legs :(
𜦾 ≈ α ≈ 𒁍 ≈ 𒀫 aˡbūru 𒀠𒁍 al-puʳ first proto character ᚠ Fehu ≈ Vieh

𒋩𒇀𒃻𒍇 ŠUR-GIGIR-ša₂-ULU₃ 𒋩 ŠUR ≈ ša₂uru17 ≈ ζ Tauri
